verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Depart, <S%H3212><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%> from here, <S%H5971><s%> you and the people that you have brought up <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of which I swore <S%H7650><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5414><s%> 'I will give it to your seed. <S%H2233><s%>'

I will send <S%H7971><s%> an angel <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; <S%H1644><s%> and I will drive out the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> and the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> and the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite: <S%H2983><s%>

to a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey: <S%H1706><s%> for I will not go up <S%H5927><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you, <S%H7186><s%> for you are a stiff-necked people, <S%H5971><s%> lest I consume <S%H3615><s%> you in the way. <S%H1870><s%>"
When the people <S%H5971><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> this evil <S%H7451><s%> news, <S%H1697><s%> they mourned: <S%H56><s%> and no one <S%H376><s%> put <S%H7896><s%> on his jewelry. <S%H5716><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Tell <S%H559><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> <S%H7186><s%> 'You are a stiff-necked people. <S%H5971><s%> If I were to go up <S%H5927><s%> into your midst <S%H7130><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> moment, <S%H7281><s%> I would consume <S%H3615><s%> you. <S%H3381><s%> Therefore now take off your jewelry <S%H5716><s%> from you, <S%H3045><s%> that I may know what to do to you. <S%H6213><s%>'"
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> stripped <S%H5337><s%> themselves of their jewelry <S%H5716><s%> from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Horeb onward. <S%H2722><s%>

Now Moses <S%H4872><s%> used to take <S%H3947><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> and to pitch <S%H5186><s%> it outside <S%H2351><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> far away <S%H7368><s%> from the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and he called <S%H7121><s%> it <S%H168><s%> "The Tent of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>" It happened that everyone who sought <S%H1245><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> which was outside <S%H2351><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

It happened that when Moses <S%H4872><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to the Tent, <S%H168><s%> that all the people <S%H5971><s%> rose up, <S%H6965><s%> and stood, <S%H5324><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> at their tent <S%H168><s%> door, <S%H6607><s%> and <S%H310><s%> watched <S%H5027><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> until he had gone <S%H935><s%> into the Tent. <S%H168><s%>

It happened, <S%H4872><s%> when Moses entered <S%H935><s%> into the Tent, <S%H168><s%> that the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud <S%H6051><s%> descended, <S%H3381><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent, <S%H168><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> with Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

All the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud <S%H6051><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent, <S%H168><s%> and all the people <S%H5971><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> and worshiped, <S%H7812><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> at their tent <S%H168><s%> door. <S%H6607><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to face, <S%H6440><s%> as a man <S%H376><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> to his friend. <S%H7453><s%> He turned again <S%H7725><s%> into the camp, <S%H4264><s%> but his servant <S%H8334><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> a young man, <S%H5288><s%> didn't <S%H4185><s%> depart out <S%H4185><s%> of the Tent. <S%H168><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H7200><s%> you tell <S%H559><s%> me, <S%H5927><s%> 'Bring up this people: <S%H5971><s%>' and you haven't <S%H3045><s%> let me know whom you will send <S%H7971><s%> with me. <S%H559><s%> Yet you have said, <S%H3045><s%> 'I know you by name, <S%H8034><s%> and you have also found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in my sight. <S%H5869><s%>'

Now therefore, <S%H4672><s%> if I have found favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> please show <S%H3045><s%> me now your ways, <S%H1870><s%> that I may know <S%H3045><s%> you, <S%H4672><s%> so that I may find favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight: <S%H5869><s%> and consider <S%H7200><s%> that this nation <S%H1471><s%> is your people. <S%H5971><s%>"
He said, <S%H559><s%> "My presence <S%H6440><s%> will go <S%H3212><s%> with you, <S%H5117><s%> and I will give you rest."
He said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H6440><s%> "If your presence doesn't <S%H1980><s%> go with me, <S%H5927><s%> don't carry us up from here.

For how would people know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H645><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> I and your people? <S%H5971><s%> Isn't <S%H3212><s%> it in that you go with us, <S%H6395><s%> so that we are separated, I and your people, <S%H5971><s%> from all the people <S%H5971><s%> who are on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the earth? <S%H127><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "I will do <S%H6213><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%> also that you have spoken; <S%H1696><s%> for you have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in my sight, <S%H5869><s%> and I know <S%H3045><s%> you by name. <S%H8034><s%>"
He said, <S%H559><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> show <S%H7200><s%> me your glory. <S%H3519><s%>"

He said, <S%H559><s%> "I will make all my goodness <S%H2898><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> before you, <S%H7121><s%> and will proclaim the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you. <S%H2603><s%> I will be gracious to whom I will be gracious, <S%H2603><s%> and will show mercy <S%H7355><s%> on whom I will show mercy. <S%H7355><s%>"
He said, <S%H559><s%> "You cannot <S%H3201><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> my face, <S%H6440><s%> for man <S%H120><s%> may not see <S%H7200><s%> me and live. <S%H2425><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> also said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H4725><s%> there is a place by me, <S%H5324><s%> and you shall stand on the rock. <S%H6697><s%>

It will happen, <S%H3519><s%> while my glory passes by, <S%H5674><s%> that I will put <S%H7760><s%> you in a cleft <S%H5366><s%> of the rock, <S%H6697><s%> and will cover <S%H5526><s%> you with my hand <S%H3709><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> I have passed by; <S%H5674><s%>
then I will take <S%H5493><s%> away my hand, <S%H3709><s%> and you will see <S%H7200><s%> my back; <S%H268><s%> but my face <S%H6440><s%> shall not be seen. <S%H7200><s%>"
